name: SpaceDRG
description:
SpaceDRG is a high-octane, motion sickness inducing action game featuring cute pixel art graphics. Fight against the letters D, R & G in a space themed 1980s retro arcade environment. Compete with friends for the top spot on online leader boards, master the art of space navigation and collect power ups to even the odds. SpaceDRG features a unique psychedelic color system which is a feast for the eyes and senses.

Become a Master of Self Control


SpaceDRG features a revolutionary convention breaking keyboard layout that encourages players to regulate emotions, resist impulsivity, and stay focused on long-term goals. Self-awareness, discipline, and aligning choices with personal values are key to success in the game.

Use Power Responsibly


SpaceDRG encourages the responsible use of in-game power. Wield power responsibly to navigate challenges. Misuse can lead to negative consequences. Recognizing the responsibility that accompanies power is essential for fostering a harmonious balance between authority and accountability.

Compete In Online Leader Boards


SpaceDRG contributes to overall societal progress by encouraging competition via online leader boards. This method has been proven to motivate players to improve continuously by using their creativity, efficiency, and resilience, while also cultivating essential skills and work ethics.
